Package updaterules

Provides classes for updating matrix H in the direction of minimising the distance D(X, WH).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FGDKLUpdateRule
    Performs fast-gradient-descent update for the generalized Kullback-Leibler divergence with regularization
    FGDMUpdateRule
    Performs fast-gradient-descent update for the euclidean distance with regularization
    MKLUpdateRule
    Performs multiplicative update for the generalized Kullback-Leibler divergence with regularization
    MUpdateRule
    Performs multiplicative update for the euclidean distance with regularization
    RegularizationUpdateRule
    Provides a template for updating matrix H in the direction of minimizing the distance D(X, WH) with regularization
    UpdateRule
    Provides a template for updating matrix H in the direction of minimizing the distance D(X, WH)

Package updaterules Description

Provides classes for updating matrix H in the direction of minimising the distance D(X, WH).
  • Multiplicative update rule for the euclidean distance with regularization
  • Multiplicative update tule for the Kullback-Leibler divergence with regularization
  • Fast-gradient-descent update rule for the euclidean distance with regularization
  • Fast-gradient-descent update rule for the Kullback-Leibler divergence with regularization
See Also:
MUpdateRule, MKLUpdateRule, FGDMUpdateRule, FGDKLUpdateRule
